name: Learn Chinese Free Offline For Travel
description: Learn Chinese is an application developed by Chinese language experts. This is a pocket communication dictionary, used in offices, schools, amusement parks, shopping centers, airports, bus stations, train stations, tourist attractions. .. Its free to learn Chinese without internet connection. Features: 1. Sort threads by topic for use in many situations 2. Suggest common and common terms of communication 3. Standard pronunciation guide in Chinese 4. Record your voice 5. Create your favorite word list
